Service Description

Construction Cost Calculators

CostFlowAI provides web-based construction cost estimation tools designed for professional use by general contractors, construction managers, and specialty contractors.

Rough Order of Magnitude (ROM) Estimates

All calculations provided are ROM estimates intended for preliminary planning and budgeting purposes. Results should not be used as final pricing without professional validation and detailed takeoffs.

Educational Content

Our blog and documentation provide industry insights and best practices for construction cost estimation and project management.

Professional Use and Limitations

Industry Context

Our calculators are designed for use by construction industry professionals who understand the limitations and appropriate applications of ROM estimating methodologies.

Validation Required

Users must validate all calculations through:

  • Detailed material takeoffs
  • Current local pricing verification
  • Site-specific condition assessments
  • Professional engineering review where applicable

No Substitution for Professional Judgment

Calculators do not replace the need for experienced professional judgment, site evaluation, and detailed project analysis.
